user.title: Add Pollen Information
user.description: Select the country and location where you want to monitor the pollen forecast and the language you want your sensors configured as. You need an API key for polleninformation.at. Request it at: https://www.polleninformation.at/en/data-interface/request-an-api-key

error.connection_error: Could not connect to the pollen service
error.api_error: The pollen service returned an error
error.suggested_country: No data found for selected country at this location. Try changing country or location.
error.no_sensors_for_country: No sensors found for selected country at this location.
error.no_pollen_data: No pollen data returned for this location.
